comments.body:
I would also compare the location to the location of the box before you tapped it.

Also, compare the actual position and height and alignment of the actual RenderParagraph boxes. That's what we really care about.
Maybe in fact use the text selection API to get the exact positions of the text boxes and compare those.
you can probably factor this out to make sure you're doing the exact same check for both tests. (This will be more important once you make the test even more precise as suggested above.)
